content.title: Add a Label Widget
content.body:
1. From the Templates explorer, navigate to Components > userEntry.emailField and select emailField.
  2. From the lower-left corner of Iris, go to the Default Library and click on the search icon .
  3. In the search bar, clear any previous text and enter Label.
  4. From the results, select Label, drag and drop the widget onto the emailField flex container in the canvas.
  5. From the Project explorer, right-click on the new label widget and rename the label BottomLabel.
